idea-plugin.name: Debug Variable Save Load
idea-plugin.description:
Save and load objects in debugger variable tree. In addition, copying JSON or Java code from debug variables is available too.

Usage

In a debugger breakpoint stack frame, right click on a variable, you will see "Save Value", "Load Value..." and "Copy value as Java code" on the menu.

  • "Save Value" will directly save the selected value.
  • "Load Value..." will popup a list of previously saved values, you can select one and load it to the variable. It works just like "Set Value".
  • "Copy value as Java code" will copy value as java code to the clipboard.

Notes

  • The plugin applies Kryo to serialize and persist the objects. It is basically designed to save/load pure data objects. If the type of the object is not supported by Kryo's default serializer, it cannot be saved.
  • All data are saved in USER_HOME/.IntelliJPlugin/DebuggerVariableSaveLoader/
